mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.gift_config_id AS "giftConfigId", a.goods_id AS "goodsId", a.goods_count AS "goodsCount", a.merchant_code AS "merchantCode", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.goods_settlement_price AS "goodsSettlementPrice", a.goods_standart_id AS "goodsStandartId"
LEFT JOIN gift_config b ON b.id = a.gift_config_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gift_config_goods( id, gift_config_id, goods_id, goods_count, merchant_code, del_flag, goods_settlement_price, goods_standart_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{giftConfigId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsCount}, #{merchantCode}, #{delFlag}, #{goodsSettlementPrice}, #{goodsStandartId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gift_config_goods SET gift_config_id = #{giftConfigId}, goods_id = #{goodsId}, goods_count = #{goodsCount}, merchant_code = #{merchantCode}, goods_settlement_price = #{goodsSettlementPrice}, goods_standart_id = #{goodsStandartId} WHERE id = #{id}
